0.text: We've been living here in the caves for generations, trying to keep the Obsidians alive.

opts.text: How many of you are left?

1.text: Quite a few, we're spread pretty far throughout the caves at this point. Our main problem now is restoring our traditions.

opts.text: Traditions? So you've lost part of your culture?
Interesting. Would I be able to read some of your historical documents?

2.text: Its been about 50 generations. There was about a 100 of us out here originally. We've been growing since.

opts.text: That's good. At least you aren't dying out or anything.
And your ancestors passed down all your knowlwedge to you?

3.text: Ya, we dont really like to talk about it, but we only know what those left in the caves passed down to us.

opts.text: That's a shame, would I be able to read any of your history?

4.text: Unfortunately no. We don't let outsiders read our historical texts typically. It's very rare.
